<small>Also see: [[H4042]] | [[H5462]]</small>

 I. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סָכַר‎</span>] **verb** ==shut up, stop up== (Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎סְכַר‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***shut up, stop up, dam up***; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***fill, stop up, dam*** (river), etc., also ***also close, stop up*** door, [[BDB#Lane|Lane]]<sup>1390</sup>; Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***sikêru***</u></abbr>, ***dam up***, II. 2. ***stop ears***; compare ***sikkuru, bolt*** [[BDB#Dl|Dl]]<sup>HWB 499</sup>; apparently kindr. with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סגר‎</span>; — hence Egyptian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***t&amp;213;akar***</u></abbr>, ***barrier***, [[BDB#Bondi|Bondi]]<sup>88</sup>); — 

**Niph\`al** ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִסָּכֵר פִּי וגו‎</span> [[Ps.63.12|Ps 63:12]] ***the mouth*** of liars ***shall be stopped***; 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִּסָּֽכְרוּ‎</span> [[Gen.8.2|Gen 8:2]] ([[BDB#P|P]]) ***and*** the springs of the deep etc., ***were shut up***. **Pi\`el** ***Perfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְסִכַרְתִּ֫י אֶתמִֿצְרַיִם בְּיַד‎</span> [[Isa.19.4|Isa 19:4]] ***and I will shut up (deliver) Egypt into the hand of***, etc. (compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סגר‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מגן‎</span>).
